name: TimeStalker (GMTK 2019)
description:
TimeStalker is a very fast FPS. You are an elite soldier, but you only have one minute to live. To extend this minute, you have to collect time in this strange world. Each enemy gives time when they die. In this world, time is not a dimension, it is an instrument.

WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
Mouse - Look Around
R - To restart at any time

This is not what the game look like, this is a demo.

Please download the game for a better visual quality.
